name: Bipolar snake - GGJ2022
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam 2022 - in the Globant ARG site.

To play you only need to unzip the file and run the executable. We only offer windows exports at the time.

Then you can play with arrows or WASD. Esc should bring you to main menu.
